title: Poets of Twang
teaser: featuring John Doe and Buddy Miller
description: What happens when two guys from the East Coast head West with guitars? They become country singers, naturally. But the path there wasn't so obvious. Buddy Miller has been everywhere: Austin, Los Angeles, New York and now Nashville. We'll talk about his musical journey from outlaw to alt-country and how he's carving out a new "old" style in the Music City. Then we'll visit with Los Angeles poet and punk rocker John Doe of the band X, who has found inspiration in the Countrypolitan sounds of the 1960s.
contentencoded: What happens when two guys from the East Coast head West with guitars? They become country singers, naturally. But the path there wasn't so obvious. Buddy Miller has been everywhere: Austin, Los Angeles, New York and now Nashville. We'll talk about his musical journey from outlaw to alt-country and how he's carving out a new "old" style in the Music City. Then we'll visit with Los Angeles poet and punk rocker John Doe of the band X, who has found inspiration in the Countrypolitan sounds of the 1960s.
